$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/readme.title: $:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/readme
$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/readme.text: This plugin adds a Printing ~StoryRiver in a new Window to ~TiddlyWiki5

$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/styles.title: $:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/styles

$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/pag.title: $:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/page-break
$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/pag.text:
\define get-tiddler() $:/state/PrintRiver/page-break/$(currentTiddler)$

<$checkbox tiddler=<<get-tiddler>> field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no">
break
</$checkbox>

$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/pri.title: $:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/print-window
$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/pri.text: \define resolve-classes(class) $(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ $class$ \end \whitespace trim <$button class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/PrintList" $subfilter="[]"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-window" $param="$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Templates/PrintRiver" windowTitle="TiddlyWiki5 - PrintRiver"/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/print-button}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/PrintWindow/Caption}}/>

$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/sor.title: $:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/sort
$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/sor.text:
\whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/CloseAll/ \define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/PrintList" $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]"/> \end \define placeholder()
\end \define droppable-item(button) \whitespace trim <$droppable actions=<> enable=<>> <>
$button$
\end <$reveal state="$:/state/PrintRiver/sort-dropdown" type="match" text=""> <$button class=<> tooltip="sort" aria-label="sort" popup="$:/state/PrintRiver/sort-dropdown"> {{$:/core/images/menu-button}} <$reveal state="$:/state/PrintRiver/sort-dropdown" type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class=<> tooltip="sort" aria-label="sort" popup="$:/state/PrintRiver/sort-dropdown"> {{$:/core/images/menu-button}} <$reveal type="popup" state="$:/state/PrintRiver/sort-dropdown" class="tc-print-tiddler-sort-dropdown tc-popup-keep"> <$list filter="[list[$:/PrintList]]" history="$:/PrintHistoryList" storyview="pop">
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button="""<$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-small-gap-right"><$action-listops $tiddler="$:/PrintList" $subfilter="-[]"/>{{$:/core/images/close-button}}<$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/>"""/>
<$tiddler tiddler="">
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button="""<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/PrintList" list=""/><>"""/>

$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/tid.title: $:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/tiddler-body-fontsize
$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/tid.text: tiddler-body fontsize: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/PrintRiver/tiddler-body-fontsize" placeholder="tiddler body fontsize" default="" tag="input"/>

$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/tid.title: $:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/tiddler-body-lineheight
$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/tid.text: tiddler-body lineheight: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/PrintRiver/tiddler-body-lineheight" placeholder="tiddler body lineheight" default="" tag="input"/>

$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/too.title: $:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/tools
$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Buttons/too.text:
\whitespace trim
<$reveal state="$:/state/PrintRiver/tools-dropdown" type="match" text="">
<$button class=<<resolve-classes>> tooltip="tools" aria-label="tools" popup="$:/state/PrintRiver/tools-dropdown">
{{$:/core/images/theme-button}}
</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal state="$:/state/PrintRiver/tools-dropdown" type="nomatch" text="">
<$button class=<<resolve-classes "tc-selected">> tooltip="sort" aria-label="sort" popup="$:/state/PrintRiver/tools-dropdown">
{{$:/core/images/theme-button}}
</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="popup" state="$:/state/PrintRiver/tools-dropdown" class="tc-print-tiddler-tools-dropdown tc-popup-keep">
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/PrintToolbar/Tools]]" variable="listItem">
<$transclude tiddler=<<listItem>> mode="block"/>
</$list>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Templates/P.title: $:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Templates/PrintRiver
$:/plugins/BTC/PrintRiver/ui/Templates/P.text:
\define print-river-classes() tc-print-tiddler-river \end \define resolve-classes(class) $(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ $class$ \end \whitespace trim <$navigator story="$:/PrintList" history="$:/PrintHistoryList" openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver}} relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}>
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/PrintToolbar]]" variable="listItem"> <$transclude tiddler=<>/>
>> <$list filter="[list[$:/PrintList]]" template="$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate" editTemplate="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate" storyview="classic"/>
